title: Enhancing Patient Care Practice Competencies: Neuroscience-Based Socioscientific Issues and Cognitive Empathy Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze multiple perspectives in neuroscience-based social problem scenarios and apply cognitive empathy strategies.
Learners can objectively articulate emotional responses to dilemma situations in simulation/VR environments using a cognitive empathy framework.
Learners can enhance their ability to design discussions that combine critical thinking and empathetic communication on socially controversial topics.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
